articles.author: Amanda Kooser
articles.title: 'Ice Spiders' On Mars Star In Spacecraft Snapshots - Forbes
articles.description: Dark formations with leg-like tendrils pop out in European Space Agency images of Mars. These eye-catching seasonal spiders aren't alive, though.
articles.content:
"Spiders" populate the area near Inca City on Mars as seen by ESA's Mars Express spacecraft.
ESA/DLR/FU Berlin
Signs of spiders from Mars is an eye-catching title for an announcement from the Europ… [+3118 chars]
